sense.def:
Knowledge
je védenje in razumevanje o neki témi.

seg.quote: All knowledge comes to us through our senses.

sense.def:
Kadar človek reče, da je nekaj res
to the best of one's knowledge
, hoče povedati, da misli, da je tisto res, čeprav ni povsem prepričan.

seg.quote: ...a play which to the best of my knowledge has never been performed in Britain.
